translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあ、本当に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, really..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これどこで買えるお茶っ葉なんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where can you buy tea leaves like this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んふふー、自家製ハーブティー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe—it's homemade herbal tea."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ、すごい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, amazing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回は本拠地があるし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This time we have a home base,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんも見てくれるから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Bisketta-san is also taking care of things,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハーブを育てたり出来るのがいいわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so being able to grow herbs is really nice."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うちらも、昔は散々
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We also used to drink this guy's brewed tea a lot back in the day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつの淹れた茶を飲んだもんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We drank the tea he brewed a lot."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「冒険なんてなぁただでさえしんどいもんだし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Adventuring itself is tough enough,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂の時代は今よりも安全な地ってのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and in my time, places that were safe—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんと〜に少なくてなあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were really few and far between..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほんの少しの休憩でも地獄に仏、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even just a short rest is like a Buddha in hell,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにカフェの茶があれば尚更だった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it was even better if you had café tea there."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よく言うわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You say that a lot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんと香りも楽しんでねって言っても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even when I said to properly enjoy the aroma,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっとも聞かずにガブガブ飲んでた人が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you didn't listen at all and just gulped it down."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Was I like that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, you were."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハーブティーは香りを楽しむことで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Herbal tea's fatigue recovery effect comes from enjoying the aroma... but even if I said that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲労回復の効果が得られて……って言っても、
口に入りゃあなんでも一緒だろって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you said anything that goes into the mouth is the same."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー、あー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, ah—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言ったかも知れんなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I might have said that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、そういうのよく分かんねぇしな、儂は」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I don't really understand those things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ、好きだったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I liked that one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのやたら甘い奴」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That ridiculously sweet one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれは渋ーいお茶に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That was just a really astringent tea,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砂糖たっぷり入れてただけよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with loads of sugar added, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、あれが美味かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, that was delicious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 久しぶりに、あの甘ーい茶が飲みてぇな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'd like to drink that sweet tea again after a long time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲労困憊中に飲むと本当に効くんだあれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It really works when you drink it while utterly exhausted."
"Heh~?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、なんじゃい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? What is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んーん、あなた当時そんなこと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, you never said anything like that back then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一言も言わなかったじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not even a single word."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ？　別に言うようなことでもねぇだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? It's not like it was something worth mentioning."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう、なんでそんなこと言うかなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez, why would you say something like that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言った方がいいに決まってるじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course you should have said it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カオスはそういうとこ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chaos is really hopeless about things like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目駄目なんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's terrible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かっ、昔はもっと可愛げのある女だったのにな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-they used to be a much more lovable woman back then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんてーかなぁー、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How should I put it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビクビクおどおど一生懸命でなぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all nervous, twitchy, and trying their best,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっかりスレちまったよなぁお前」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you've completely grown cynical."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、あーっ！　あーーーーっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ahh! Aaaagh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のはひどいわよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was terrible!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーあー、うるさいうるさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ah, you're noisy, noisy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんか……中年夫婦みたいな会話だな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow... this conversation is like a middle-aged couple...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでサラッと喧嘩にスライドしてんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why did it so smoothly slide into an argument?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは、そうですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahaha, yes, it is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、どうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here you go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　なんだ、これ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What's this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっき言ってたご所望のお茶。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The tea you requested earlier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気分だけでも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just to get the feeling."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっきは……ちょっと、嬉しかった……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Earlier... I was a little happy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、当時言ってくれればいいのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I wish you had told me back then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ引っ込めろよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Put that away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂に淹れたらもったいねぇぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it'd be a waste to make this for me."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあ、本当に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, really..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これどこで買えるお茶っ葉なんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where can you buy tea leaves like this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んふふー、自家製ハーブティー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe—it's homemade herbal tea."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ、すごい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, amazing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回は本拠地があるし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This time we have a home base,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんも見てくれるから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Bisketta-san is also taking care of things,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハーブを育てたり出来るのがいいわね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so being able to grow herbs is really nice."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うちらも、昔は散々
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We also used to drink this guy's brewed tea a lot back in the day."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつの淹れた茶を飲んだもんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We drank the tea he brewed a lot."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「冒険なんてなぁただでさえしんどいもんだし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Adventuring itself is tough enough,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂の時代は今よりも安全な地ってのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and in my time, places that were safe—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんと〜に少なくてなあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were really few and far between..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほんの少しの休憩でも地獄に仏、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even just a short rest is like a Buddha in hell,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにカフェの茶があれば尚更だった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it was even better if you had café tea there."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よく言うわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You say that a lot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんと香りも楽しんでねって言っても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even when I said to properly enjoy the aroma,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっとも聞かずにガブガブ飲んでた人が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you didn't listen at all and just gulped it down."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだったか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Was I like that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, you were."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハーブティーは香りを楽しむことで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Herbal tea's fatigue recovery effect comes from enjoying the aroma... but even if I said that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲労回復の効果が得られて……って言っても、
口に入りゃあなんでも一緒だろって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you said anything that goes into the mouth is the same."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー、あー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, ah—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言ったかも知れんなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I might have said that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、そういうのよく分かんねぇしな、儂は」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I don't really understand those things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ、好きだったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I liked that one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あのやたら甘い奴」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That ridiculously sweet one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれは渋ーいお茶に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That was just a really astringent tea,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砂糖たっぷり入れてただけよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with loads of sugar added, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、あれが美味かった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, that was delicious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 久しぶりに、あの甘ーい茶が飲みてぇな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'd like to drink that sweet tea again after a long time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲労困憊中に飲むと本当に効くんだあれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It really works when you drink it while utterly exhausted."
"Heh~?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、なんじゃい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? What is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んーん、あなた当時そんなこと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, you never said anything like that back then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一言も言わなかったじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not even a single word."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ？　別に言うようなことでもねぇだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? It's not like it was something worth mentioning."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう、なんでそんなこと言うかなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Geez, why would you say something like that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言った方がいいに決まってるじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course you should have said it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カオスはそういうとこ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Chaos is really hopeless about things like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目駄目なんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's terrible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かっ、昔はもっと可愛げのある女だったのにな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-they used to be a much more lovable woman back then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんてーかなぁー、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "How should I put it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビクビクおどおど一生懸命でなぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: all nervous, twitchy, and trying their best,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっかりスレちまったよなぁお前」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but you've completely grown cynical."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、あーっ！　あーーーーっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ahh! Aaaagh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今のはひどいわよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was terrible!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーあー、うるさいうるさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ah, you're noisy, noisy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんか……中年夫婦みたいな会話だな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow... this conversation is like a middle-aged couple...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでサラッと喧嘩にスライドしてんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why did it so smoothly slide into an argument?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは、そうですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahaha, yes, it is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、どうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here you go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　なんだ、これ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What's this?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっき言ってたご所望のお茶。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The tea you requested earlier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気分だけでも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just to get the feeling."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっきは……ちょっと、嬉しかった……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Earlier... I was a little happy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、当時言ってくれればいいのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I wish you had told me back then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ引っ込めろよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Put that away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂に淹れたらもったいねぇぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it'd be a waste to make this for me."
